name: 64-Bit Getaway Driver
description:
A 64x64 game created for Lowrezjam 2022.

You play as a getaway driver who is attempting to flee. Use boost panels and booby traps in order to get a high score!

It is my first game so there are still quite a few things I definitely would have liked to improve on, I would like to hear your feedback and thanks for trying my game out!
